title: Destroy the Elder Brain
content:
, you will attack Orpheus and the Stones will go to you. Lae'zel questions you. You will have the following dialogue options.

I'm doing what I planned to do from the beginning - taking control. Don't worry - you're still part of my design. Seizing the moment.

Choosing dialogue 2 will make the the Netherbrain control your party, and you will be sitting on the thrown while mind flayers take over, and your companions at your side. This ends Destroy the Elder Brain

How to unlock Destroy the Elder
